Flow.description: This Flow is triggered when a Case is updated. This flow maps all the required fields when status is changed or Site/Circuit/GPON is changed and sends an email notification. V9 - removed on Resolved path - Violation path is removed as it is not used From V12-V13 - Removed FieldEngineerEmail and FieldEngineer (unwanted) mapping and added RouteName (in Circuit Updated ? path) From V13-V14 - Mapped Assigned time instead of inprogress time in Circuit Updated --- Proactive Path and Status to Assigned

formulas.description: contact Field Engineer's First name & Last name as Related field's full name is not working
formulas.name: FE_FullName

textTemplates.name: UpdateNotificationBody
textTemplates.text: Hi {!$Record.ContactEmail} . The case {!$Record.CaseNumber} status has changes from {!$Record__Prior.Status} to {!$Record.Status} . We are working to resolve this as soon as possible .Thanks you
